General.Name: OBI Pharma
General.Description: OBI Pharma, Inc., a biopharma company, develops and licenses novel therapeutic agents for unmet medical needs against cancer in Taiwan and internationally. It offers Adagloxad Simolenin (OBI-822), a breast cancer active immunity anti-cancer drug for generating antibody against tumor surface antigen Globo H; OBI-833, an immunity anti-cancer drug for the treatment of lung cancer; OBI-866 SSEA-4, an active immune-oncology drug; OBI-888, a Globo H monoclonal antibody; OBI-999, an antibody drug conjugate; OBI-3424, a micromolecule chemotherapy prodrug; and OBI-858, a botulinum toxin, as well as OBI-898, OBI-998, and COVID-19 BCVax drugs. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3.Name: Dr. Yun  Yen F.A.C.P., FACP, M.D., Ph.D.
3.Title: Exec. VP & Director
